name: Daydream (itch) (Kowzak)
description:
A short game created during the Emotionnal Game Jam 2022 in Laval .

Created in 48h hours with the theme Off-Road and Eternal Return. We was a team of 5 persons in which there was Samuel Pennober <3, Lidia Loubelo, Chloe Tazzounet, Antoine Marrama and Emma Casabonne-Masounave (Samfan Team).

A most abnormal teenager leaves for her most ordinary high school... On the bus that took her, she gets lost in her thoughts and dreams. You can get lost with her in her imaginary worlds full of nightmares and escapes until someone reminds you to come back to the sad world of reality...
